name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Script Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker utilized a PowerShell script to execute malicious activities, including downloading a payload and executing commands remotely.

action--cb45a452-58f4-4bba-8e87-164df2ee.name: Kill malicious processes identified
action--cb45a452-58f4-4bba-8e87-164df2ee.description: Terminate any processes identified as malicious.

action--a3f0821a-312c-49b1-93c1-8f0b7ba7.name: Scan system for additional malicious scripts
action--a3f0821a-312c-49b1-93c1-8f0b7ba7.description: Perform a full system scan for malicious scripts and remove any found.

while-condition--cd272f72-3570-445b-b0a4.name: Scan for threats until clean
while-condition--cd272f72-3570-445b-b0a4.description: Check if any threats were detected after scanning.

action--fa3de6cb-f27a-4c00-9e62-46bb6fe9.name: Quarantine identified malware files
action--fa3de6cb-f27a-4c00-9e62-46bb6fe9.description: Move any identified malware files into quarantine.

action--b471f114-1d96-4dcb-aef9-b0f87b78.name: Block malicious IP in firewall
action--b471f114-1d96-4dcb-aef9-b0f87b78.description: Block any malicious IP addresses identified in the attack logs.

action--5cb1fa78-7e89-4a5b-801f-ef202da4.name: Disable PowerShell execution for all users
action--5cb1fa78-7e89-4a5b-801f-ef202da4.description: Set PowerShell execution policy to restricted to prevent further script execution.
